faq.question: How do I choose the best broadband plan for my needs?
faq.answer: To select the ideal broadband plan, consider your internet usage, the number of devices you plan to connect, and your budget. We recommend checking the plan's speeds and monthly cost to find what suits you best.

faq.question: How do I change my Wi-Fi password?
faq.answer: To change your Wi-Fi password, log in to your router's admin panel. You can typically access this by entering the router's IP address into your browser. Look for the Wi-Fi settings, then update the password.

faq.question: What should I do if my internet is slow?
faq.answer: If your internet is slow, try restarting your router. You can also check for network congestion by limiting the number of devices connected. Additionally, ensure that your router is in a central location and not obstructed.

faq.question: How can I reset my router to factory settings?
faq.answer: We do not recommend resetting your router unless you fully understand the process, as it will restore the router to its default settings and disconnect it from our system, causing a permanent loss of internet service.

faq.question: How can I contact customer support?
faq.answer: You can contact customer support via email at gdentbsnl@gmail.com or by calling +91 8415028828. We also offer various services during business hours.

faq.question: What is the process to upgrade my broadband plan?
faq.answer: To upgrade your broadband plan, simply visit our 'Plans' section, select a plan that suits your needs, and send it to the customer support contacts. Your new plan will be processed immediately, and you will be notified.

faq.question: How do I reset my router's admin password?
faq.answer: Log in to your router and set a new password. Alternatively, you can follow the steps provided or contact the administrator directly for assistance.

faq.question: Can I get a refund if I cancel my plan early?
faq.answer: Refunds for early plan cancellation depend on the terms and conditions of your service agreement. Typically, refunds are only issued for unused months. Please contact customer support for further assistance.

faq.question: How can I set up my new router?
faq.answer: To set up your new router, place it in a suitable location with a power backup, ensuring it is protected from direct exposure to rain or sunlight. For internet connection setup, please contact the administrator for assistance.

faq.question: What should I do if I forgot my router's admin password?
faq.answer: If you forgot your router's admin password, you can contact the administrator to reset your password without needing to reset your router.

faq.question: How do I upgrade my Wi-Fi speed?
faq.answer: To upgrade your Wi-Fi speed, contact customer support or visit the 'Plans' section on our website. You may need to change your current plan or upgrade your router to one that supports higher speeds.

faq.question: How do I check my broadband usage?
faq.answer: Contact us to get a detailed receipt for current charges and internet usage.

faq.question: How do I change my payment method?
faq.answer: You can make your bill payment either through the SMS payment link, visit the BSNL official site to pay using your Landline number, or use the BSNL Self Care app. You can also pay directly to us to pay your bill.

faq.question: Is there a way to pause my internet service temporarily?
faq.answer: Yes, you can pause your internet service temporarily by contacting customer support. We offer short-term pause options depending on your plan and location.

faq.question: How can I improve my Wi-Fi signal strength?
faq.answer: To improve your Wi-Fi signal, ensure that your router is placed in a central location. Avoid placing it near large metal objects or electronic devices. You can also try using Wi-Fi extenders for larger homes.
